column12: Store the IRIDA sample name. The IRIDA sample name will be created by the individual entering data into the IRIDA platform. IRIDA samples may be linked to metadata and sequence data, or just metadata alone. It is recommended that the IRIDA sample name be the same as, or contain, the specimen collector sample ID for better traceability. It is also recommended that the IRIDA sample name mirror the GISAID accession. IRIDA sample names cannot contain slashes. Slashes should be replaced by underscores. See IRIDA documentation for more information regarding special characters (https://irida.corefacility.ca/documentation/user/user/samples/#adding-a-new-sample).
